subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Yevgeny Plushenko made a triumphant comeback at the Russian figure skating championships in Sochi when he eased to his 10th national men’s title in his first competition in nearly a year.
snippet: Yevgeny Plushenko made a triumphant comeback at the Russian figure skating championships in Sochi when he eased to his 10th national men’s title in his first competition in nearly a year.
